hudson.tasks.Shell.command: sudo Xvfb :42 -ac & export DISPLAY=:42 wget -r -q --no-parent -nH --cut-dirs 4 -e robots=off -A gz http://releases.linaro.org/ubuntu/images/nano/latest/ wget -r -q --no-parent -nH --cut-dirs 4 -e robots=off -A gz http://releases.linaro.org/ubuntu/hwpacks/lsk-vexpress/latest/ echo y | sudo linaro-media-create --image_file vexpress.img --dev vexpress --binary linaro-*.tar.gz --hwpack hwpack_linaro-*.tar.gz mkdir sysFiles fdisk -l *.img > sectors.txt Start="$(tail -n 2 sectors.txt | awk '{print $2}')" SIZE=$(($Start * 512)) echo $SIZE sudo mount -o loop,offset=$SIZE -t auto vexpress.img sysFiles/ sudo cp sysFiles/boot/vmlinuz* . sudo cp sysFiles/boot/initrd* . sudo umount sysFiles/ sudo chown jenkins:jenkins vmlinuz* initrd* zip qemu-kernel-files.zip vmlinuz* initrd* rm *.gz *img vm*
